notes:
Background Information:
This is very standard and will be your opening build. You'll be able to two tap most squishes with headshots.

Power Ability:
Take  [Just Roll With It](item_71918d53-d84e-48f1-9940-8fbe0d9d5a41) which will recover 82.5HP per use on a 6 second cooldown. 

Items: 
We'll take the three selected items
 [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) 
 [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) 
 [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318)

Stats:
Bodyshot	73.5
Right click	52.5
Headshot	147
Mag size	7
Right click	367.5
Life steal	0.1
Life Recovered Body Shot	7.35
Life Recovered Head Shot	14.7
Life recovered Right Click	36.75
Total Health Recovered via roll 82.5

round_upgrades.notes: The sustain from this is fantastic for the money. You'll keep this option for a while.
Fairly useful at this early stage, especially if you're relying on right clicks.
By far the best option for Cass.

notes:
Background Information:
You should be experiencing a power spike here especially if you can grab both recommended items. 

Power Ability:
 [Just Roll With It](item_71918d53-d84e-48f1-9940-8fbe0d9d5a41) 

Items: 
Ideally you'll take both
[Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) 
[Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) 

If you can't afford icy coolant I'd recommend just buying anything that you can afford that increases weapon damage%, or the armour vest if you're really struggling to survive. 

Stats:
Bodyshot	84
Right click	60
Headshot	168
Mag size	7
Right click	420
Life steal	0.1
Life Recovered Body Shot	8.4
Life Recovered Head Shot	16.8
Life recovered Right Click	35
Total Health Recovered via roll 87.9

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.
Super valuable, you'll keep this throughout the game.

notes:
Background Information:
You should take Bullseye as it'll mean your uptime on the combat roll is increased. 

I typically prefer taking blues and filling up the six slots rather than taking a purple and having slots free. Especially since weapon reserves + plasma converter are still useful until the lategame, and provide great value. 

If you're playing against DVA/Rein you'll want to take  [Shieldbuster](item_9ee1f150-537d-40b9-b975-7820fb1c6a66)  and an ammo option like  [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) which can really help breaking shields/armour with your right click, otherwise I'll take items that maximise damage and focus on squishies.

Power ability:
[Bullseye](item_19cf3c95-5071-425e-beba-30af6ba15ef1)  to reduce your roll cooldown by 30% on a headshot. 

Items:
 [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) 
 [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)

Then if you can afford it, choose either  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) or  [Shieldbuster](item_9ee1f150-537d-40b9-b975-7820fb1c6a66). Don't be afraid to sell  [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) if you need to afford the  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) 

 [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34)  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0)  [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) 

Stats:

Bodyshot	91
Right click	65
Headshot	182
Mag size	7
Right click	455
Life steal	0.1
Life Recovered Body Shot	9.1
Life Recovered Head Shot	18.2
Life recovered Right Click	45.5
Total Health Recovered via roll 90.9

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.

notes:
Background:
You could take a purple here, 2-3 blues and the rest green, which is totally valid. I'll sometimes swap to maximise the number of blues here but we'll stick with the 'standard' approach. 

If you can't afford the listed options, just grab any weapon damage % items, retaining 10% lifesteal and ammo reserves. Feel free to drop the ammo in the event you can maximise weapon damage.

Items:
 [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b), this item gives you a massive powerspike provided you are able to fill all your slots. 

Keep  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) and take  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) if you didn't buy  [Shieldbuster](item_9ee1f150-537d-40b9-b975-7820fb1c6a66) in the last round, and don't need the armour/shield busting.


Stats (assuming you purchased all 3 greens, ignoring the extra 10% damage to enemies below 30% life):
Bodyshot	108.5
Right click	77.5
Headshot	217
Mag size	7
Right click	542.5
Life steal	0.1
Life Recovered Body Shot	10.85
Life Recovered Head Shot	21.7
Life recovered Right Click	54.25
Total Health Recovered via roll 96.9

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.

notes:
Background:
By now you should be able to afford the following:
1. 2 purples
1. 2-4 blues
1. 0-2 greens

I prioritise filling all slots rather than going for 2-3 at the expense of empty slots. I'll sometimes even run all blues but  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) is fantastic, so I try to retain it.   [Competitive Analysis](item_168f8109-d2cc-40cc-a6bb-2006a2f62939) is also a really compelling option against enemy DPS.

Power items:
In terms of power items, it's really a choice between extra distance (if you're needing to reposition, or getting swamped by tanks, like DVA/Rein) or if you want to leave a flashbang behind which I'll sometimes take due to the extra distance throwing off my aim. Both are ok.

[Barrel Roll](item_c5368723-a7c9-4124-9bc1-7749917b0c8a) 

Items:
 [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b),  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a), [Competitive Analysis](item_168f8109-d2cc-40cc-a6bb-2006a2f62939)  is a fantastic option as it gives 20% lifesteal and 15% extra damage against DPS which are typically your primary threat.  The stats below are calculated with this in mind. 

You could take  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) instead, but retain some lifesteal either from  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) or  [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) instead.

Stats (assuming you took  [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) and you're shooting a DPS target above 30% HP:

Bodyshot	119
Right click	85
Headshot	238
Mag size	7
Right click	595
Life steal	0.2
Life Recovered Body Shot	23.8
Life Recovered Head Shot	47.6
Life recovered Right Click	119
Total Health Recovered via roll 104.1

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.
If you can afford the closer drop this item, and take an ammo item.

notes:
Background:
I've played games where I've been able to have all six epics in round 6, which is possible if you're earning 10-12k per round. Typically from MVP bonuses. 

That said, your decisionmaking around items should be to maximise weapon damage, ensuring some lifesteal.

Items: 
We ideally want to take the following:

 [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b),  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  [Competitive Analysis](item_168f8109-d2cc-40cc-a6bb-2006a2f62939) and  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) 

Depending on what you can afford, make sure to take some of the optional items. I generally decide to take  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) over  [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) 

Stats (assuming DPS target):
Bodyshot	133
Right click	95
Headshot	292.6
Mag size	7
Right click	665
Life steal	0.2
Life Recovered Body Shot	26.6
Life Recovered Head Shot	58.5
Life recovered Right Click	133
Total Health Recovered via roll 111.9

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.

notes:
Background Information:
Typically if a match has gone on this long you'll have a lot of money saved. I've assumed about 9k per round but it's entirely likely you could be at 80k+

Power items:
For power items, take the one you didn't select in round 5, either  [Think Flash](item_3bce3ff6-cbf3-4515-b5cb-648f536a1d37) or  [Barrel Roll](item_c5368723-a7c9-4124-9bc1-7749917b0c8a).

Items:
 [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) ,  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  [Competitive Analysis](item_168f8109-d2cc-40cc-a6bb-2006a2f62939) 
These form the 'core' of the build now and you should aim to have these at a minimum. 

From here, I'll seek to take weapon damage, via  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a)  and  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448). The ability to roll away and get a bonus dmg% can be fantastic, especially if you're using your flashbang. 

 For the last option, take any of the optional items I've selected if you can afford it. You could also swap out  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) for  [Codebreaker](item_caa96c7e-655f-4d03-9bd9-0f41937fec27).

Stats (assuming DPS target, empty final slot):

Bodyshot	129.5
Right click	92.5
Headshot	284.9
Mag size	6
Right click	555
Life steal	0.2
Life Recovered Body Shot	25.9
Life Recovered Head Shot	56.98
Life recovered Right Click	111
Total Health Recovered via roll 114.9

round_upgrades.notes: By far the best option for Cass.
Niche, but can be an option if you're maxed out and want all purples.
